TopicTitle: Plugins, Parts & Mods not working after .23 Upgrade

Articles.Content:
So I upgraded to .23 (Unzipped KSP_win), replaced all files. And didn't do anything to the plugins or any other data.

I started KSP and went to the VAB but when I load any saved craft only a command pod, a mechjeb A202 and an antenna are loaded. AND the command pod is not the primary part. When I click on the command pod all other parts that were?are supposed to be attached are not attached and do not move with the command pod.

Anyone have tips or a solution?

EDIT: Even craft that I have in orbits... Only the command pod, parachute, Reflectron DP, MechjebA202 are there. The rest of the craft is missing. Even the body that it was orbiting (like Kerbin) isn't displayed.

Update: parts from mods load fine, like Mechjeb, KW, B9 etc. I was able to load a craft which has some mod parts. But none of the parts were attached, and they are not able to be attached.

Please help.

Edited December 19, 2013 by Fett2oo5
you should try updating your mods, some of them (Mech jeb specifically) is broken so you probably just need to update your mods.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62142-23-and-Mods

This thread is a ongoing list of plugins that are or are not working with .23 currently.
